Room.Name: Everborough Way/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hofton Avenue and Everborough Way.
Room.LongDescription: Directly to the north, you can see the North Oceancrest Guard Station and the north entrance to the town. There is a popular Inn on the south- western corner of the intersection and the Evenborough Stables and Riding Facilities are located on the southeastern corner. The city asks that visitors and guests leave their horses at the stables to prevent accidents with pedestrians on the roads.
